wake up.Text: Or more like good afternoon, now. You slept for a while.

wake up.Name: Kai
wake up.Text: You're in my room! That's Kai's room, by the way. I'm Kai.

wake up.Name: Kai
wake up.Text: Anyways, care to explain what you were doing sleeping the day away by that elm tree?
... I literally have no idea what you're talking about.

wake up.Name: Kai
wake up.Text: You don't know? What do you know then?

wake up.Name: Kai
wake up.Text: Well what on Earth am I going to call you then? Hm...

wake up.Name: Kai
wake up.Text: I'll call you Elm. Last name Tree. I hereby dub thee Elm Tree.

item desired.Name: Kai
item desired.Text: You know, after dragging you back from the forest, I seem to have misplaced my hunting knife.

item desired.Name: Kai
item desired.Text: Haha, you couldn't tell? Yeah, I'm one of the village hunters.

item desired.Name: Kai
item desired.Text: Not much of a hunter anymore though. What's a hunter without a hunting knife?

item desired.Name: Kai
item desired.Text: No! You don't understand. That knife was a gift from my grandfather! My pride and joy. My flesh and blood.

item desired.Name: Kai
item desired.Text: I just wish I knew were I dropped it. Maybe if I think hard enough...

idle1.Name: Kai
idle1.Text: Outside my house, on the left. What a strange place to suggest...

idle2.Name: Kai
idle2.Text: Hank works at the big barn in the upper right corner of the village. You can't miss it!

idle3.Name: Kai
idle3.Text: Anna's house is just to the left of mine! We should be able to find her there.

anna felix gone.Name: Kai
anna felix gone.Text: Phoenix is the village doctor! How do you know him? Is Phoenix that famous??

anna felix gone.Name: Elm
anna felix gone.Text: Oh -- no, I just thought that... uh...

anna felix gone.Name: Elm
anna felix gone.Text: ... that I heard his name when we were walking outside?

anna felix gone.Name: Kai
anna felix gone.Text: Really?? Damn, you must have good ears. I didn't hear anything like that.

anna felix gone.Name: Kai
anna felix gone.Text: But yeah! His place is a little south of Hank's barn. Let's go meet him!
